hey guy so i do not post here often but i suffer from adhd depression and anxiety so long story short i wa diagnosed around october although i should have been diagnosed a long while ago so the first thing i went in for wa adhd it took me this long to go in for this i am a sophomore in high school mainly because although i could not pay attention i wa smart enough to do well if that make sense and the main reason i actually did work wa because of anxiety especially with my parent being teacher but a i got older starting around middle school the material wa getting harder so i had to pay attention to do a well a i normally did and then i hit my lowest low in high school particularly this year

i am kinda in a mood to tell this story and feel free to put your first cutting deep incident in the comment my first time wa in june last year i wa cutting a lot at the time although i did not even find it an issue it wa just something i did i wa cutting my shoulder a lot at the time and i got home from school went into my room grabbed my blade and got to work now this wa a blade from a shaving razor i had taken apart it wa the sharpest blade in the razor i did not know this at the time so i put the blade to my shoulder and cut i immediately panicked the cut wa gaping open and i could see a bit of weird yellow bubbly stuff in it which i later learnt wa fat the cut wa bleeding a ton so i wa trying to stop the bleeding with about a million tissue i knew i needed stitch but i wa not about to tell anyone what i had done after about half an hour my mum came into my room to remind me that i had a tutoring lesson and we had to leave i freaked the fuck out my shoulder wa still gaping open although the bleeding had slowed down

i wa talking to one of my friend the other week and he mentioned a girl in his year at his school who is just covered with self harm scar all over both her wrist both her forearm upper arm thigh leg ankle stomach just completely covered in them this got me thinking that every school statistically will have at least one kid covered in self harm and i realised i am that kid i am not completely covered in scar but my ankle are scarred pretty badly my arm which is probably where most people look is covered in cut scar and burn i do not even hide it anymore because it is so hot i am talking like where i physically cannot wear long sleeve without passing out and i am that kid who people will stare at when he is walking to class they might whisper to their friend about my arm the teacher will see my arm and just assume that i am just another emo i do not even do anything in class because i am so depressed that i just do not have the energy to work so i must just look like a massive poser i am always on the lookout for others with scar like mine but there is nobody with them

i have been through a lot of bullying since kindergarten until last year i am in year now when i wa young i wa not dealing with the bullying i thought it wa normal because it wa something that had always been happening but when it got really bad in year i told my parent eventually because i realised i could not go on with it year it began again and then stopped then it returned yet again in year but when i got to year i began realising how to deal with it i have developed many extremely severe mental illness from lot of trauma i have experienced and this lead to lot of self hatred and lack of self worth and i used this to my advantage when i wa called faggot fuckup fatass gorilla anorexic cutter emo any of it i would laugh and fully agree and even start giving them idea for insult to give me this threw them back a lot but the physical side of it wa still an issue

lately i have lost a lot of weight and have not been eating like i will get hungry but i just do not feel like eating so i will just wait for the hunger pain to go away by themselves i did not really see a problem with this until people started pointing out that they never see me eating and that i am starting to look unhealthily thin even tho i can not really tell if i look thin or not i have been weighing myself daily and my normal weight used to be lb and i wa around that weight pretty consistently for the past few year but lately i have gone down to lb and i personally have not been able to see the difference if it wa not for the people pointing it out but i want to keep losing weight because i want to see the number on the scale get lower i have had anorexia in the past so my mom ha been getting worried about me and asking me to eat more because i am starting to look unhealthy again i am not sure what i should do because i do not want to be anorexic again because the recovery processis hell but at the same time i am afraid of gaining weight

i do not hide my arm my scar there range from month to just over a year old the scar are pretty noticeable but i am not attention seeking by not hiding them i simply can not deal with the heat and the uncomfortable feeling of wearing long sleeve while everyone else is comfortably wearing short sleeve and getting people telling me to take my jumper off like they did back when i hid my scar like the plague i have scar on my ankle my thigh my shoulder and my hip a well and i hide my ankle scar and the shoulder thigh and hip scar are hidden easily by my clothes since i am male but i only hide my ankle because they have fresher mark on them when they are older i will not hide them the one on my thigh are very extreme there are an insane amount of scar and some are quite deep and i refuse to let anyone get a glimpse of my thigh just because the scarring is so severe but my arm which is only moderately scarred i will not hide it is australia it get extremely hot wearing long sleeve is actually risking my health because of how hot it is so no i am not attention seeking i am just choosing to not give a shit

i often feel like all the part of my life are very confusing i often get a distorted sense of time i will think it is pm at midnight for example and i often find my sense of reality to be very odd i struggle to know whether or not anything is real and if it is everything seems to blend together into one big slab of time where i am not there like i am watching it happen from somewhere else watching time speed by before my eye i also tend to have very confused thought i will be speaking then suddenly forget what i wa saying or even the topic of conversation or who i am talking to or i will just randomly say stuff that make no sense and i do not know why

i try my hardest to act like everything is good but it is not i am lonely and miserable i get angry because i am lonely and miserable if i died today i know deep down that i would be forgotten within month not a word about me i know why but it still hurt to know how invaluable i am to everyone i try so hard to fit in to make new friend there is just so much about me that is unlikable and i know that it is not the depression talking i have seen it for myself in people eye and in their body signal i want to live but unemployment depression sadness and anger around the clock is not a life worth living i can not even see death a an escape there is no escape for this i am going to be a shell no matter what

a few week ago i wa on a train some guy got on about an hour into the ride of three hour with his girlfriend they sat down and she wa being quite loud so i looked over for a second instinctively and he shouted at me i just ignored him and went back to my music over the next half hour however i heard him muttering to his girlfriend about me they were sitting maybe seat in front of me so i could not hear too well he got up after a while to i would assume use the toilet and when he walked past me he wa glaring at me and even leered at me i wa quite afraid that he would be getting off at my stop and i wa not sure what to do so i held onto my bag securely and started going over all the scenario in my head that could happen what he wanted and everything like that

i have a severe anxiety and panic disorder it make me super aware of my throat and i feel gaggy when my anxiety flare up i also have gerd this past year i have relapsed into really bad panic attack which triggered agoraphobia and most of my time is spent in my bed i am working on therapy after the new year i do not know if it is my head but i am super aware of my throat all the time which then cause me to gag i do not know if this is my anxiety or gerd or even both but it is incredibly frustrating last winter i saw my doctor and i wa gagging so bad in his office that i could barely talk he prescribed me rabeprazole and so i took it for a month or two and then stopped not sure why the gagging is back though and so today i took one i am hoping it doe something and i am just thinking it is my anxiety and my head concentrating too much it is just frustrating because it is hard to eat i will be scared of eating and then gag ugh hopefully this made sense
